name: Twice-Baked Ranch Potatoes
author: Jeff Mordal
summary: Creamy twice baked potatoes with a ranch taste.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package ranch salad dressing mix
½ cup shredded reduced-fat Cheddar cheese
directions: Scrub and dry potatoes, then prick several times with a fork and place on a microwave-safe plate
Heat in microwave on high until tender, 18 to 20 minutes; remove and allow to cool for 10 minutes
Combine Neufchatel cheese and milk in a small bowl; beat in salad dressing mix
Cut potatoes in half lengthwise; remove pulp, leaving a thin potato skin shell
Mix pulp into cheese mixture and mash
Spoon mixture into potato shells; sprinkle with Cheddar cheese
Place two potatoes on a microwave-safe plate
Heat in microwave on high until heated through and cheese is melted, 3 1/2 to 4 1/2 minutes
